mapper.select:
select p.id, p.`name`, p.method, p.code, p.menu_id, p.sys_type, p.creator, p.create_time, p.updater, p.update_time, m.`name` as menuName from system_permission p left join system_menu m on p.menu_id = m.id where 1=1
and p.menu_id in
#{item}
and p.`name` like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
and p.`code` like CONCAT('%', #{code}, '%')
select distinct code, method from system_permission
select distinct p.code, p.method from system_permission p inner join system_role__permission rp on p.id = rp.permission_id where rp.role_id = #{roleId}
select id from system_permission where menu_id = #{menuId}
